p: This study aims to compare the effectiveness of the different lockdown strategies, the need of a considerable diagnostic PCR testing capability as well as the impact of the representative viral strains isolated in each Country presented here. To this purpose, we focused our study on Italy, Spain, France, Germany, UK, Sweden and United States, broadening our previous analysis of SARS-CoV-2 variants [ 9]. The characterization of SARS-CoV-2 variants might also significantly contribute to the design of effective therapies, vaccines and novel diagnostics tools.
